name: Choong-Jang
meaning: Choong-Jang is the pseudonym given to General Kim Duk Ryang who lived during the Yi Dynasty, 14th Century. This pattern ends with a left-hand attack to symbolise the tragedy of his death at 27 in prison before he was able to reach full maturity.

moves.title: Closed Ready Stance A
moves.description: Closed ready stance A.
moves.korean: moa junbi sogi A

moves.title: Side front block
moves.description: Move right foot to 3 o'clock into sitting stance. Right inner forearm side front block with simultaneous left downward block.
moves.korean: annun so an palmok yopap makgi

moves.title: Side front block
moves.description: Remain in sitting stance. Left inner forearm side front block with simultaneous right downward block.
moves.korean: annun so an palmok yopap makgi

moves.title: Angle punch
moves.korean: moa so giokja jirugi
moves.description: Bring right foot to left. Slow left angle punch across the chest.

moves.title: High double finger thrust
moves.korean: gunnun so doo sangarak nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with left foot into walking stance. Right reverse high double finger thrust.

moves.title: High double finger thrust
moves.korean: gunnun so doo sangarak nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with right foot into walking stance. Left reverse high double finger thrust.

moves.title: Backfist front strike
moves.korean: gunnun so dung joomuk ap taerigi
moves.description: Maintain stance. Right backfist front strike.

moves.title: Rising block
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok chookyo makgi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with left foot. Left outer forearm rising block.

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock with right foot. Right middle punch.

moves.title: Forearm guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Pivot left 360° on the left foot to face 12 o'clock. Slide backwards to 6 o'clock into l-stance. Middle forearm guarding block.

moves.title: Front low snap kick
moves.korean: najunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Right low front snap kick to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: High flat fingertip thrust
moves.korean: nachuo so opun sonkut nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Land in low stance. Right high flat fingertip thrust.

moves.title: High turning kick
moves.korean: nopunde dollyo chagi
moves.description: Drop to left knee turning toward 10 o'clock. Hands on the floor. High right turning kick to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: High punch
moves.korean: nopunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Land forward. Left hand stays on floor. Right high punch to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Side elbow thrust
moves.korean: niunja so yop palkup tulgi
moves.description: Stand and pivot on the right foot to face 6 o'clock. Move left foot to l-stance. Left side elbow thrust, looking over left shoulder.

moves.title: Forearm guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Pivot 180° right on the right foot to face 12 o'clock. Left l-stance middle forearm guarding block.

moves.title: Palm scooping block
moves.korean: niunja so sonbadak duro makgi
moves.description: Step backwards with right foot to 6 o'clock into l-stance. Left palm scooping block.

moves.title: Right knife-hand middle outward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi
moves.description: Step backwards with left foot to 6 o'clock into l-stance. Right middle knife-hand outward strike.

moves.title: X-fist pressing block
moves.korean: gunnun so kyocha joomuk kaunde noollo makgi
moves.description: Pivot 180° left on the right foot to face 6 o'clock. Move left foot to walking stance. X-fist pressing block.

moves.title: Knee snap kick
moves.korean: moorup najunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Pull hands to hip and execute right knee snap kick.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Land behind left foot. Pivot 180° left on the right foot to face 12 o'clock. Right l-stance knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: Right side elbow thrust
moves.korean: niunja so yop palkup tulgi
moves.description: Slide right foot forward. Turn to face 6 o'clock. Right elbow thrust toward 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal
moves.description: Pivot 180° on the left foot to face 12 o'clock. Left l-stance knife-hand guarding block.

moves.title: Side piercing kick
moves.korean: kaunde yopcha jirugi
moves.description: Right side piercing kick to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Twin palm pressing block
moves.korean: dwitbal so sang sonbadak noollo makgi
moves.description: Place right leg behind left. Pivot 180° left on the right foot to 6 o'clock into rear-foot stance. Twin palm pressing block.

moves.title: Forearm block & backfist strike
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok/dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi
moves.description: Step forward with right foot to 6 o'clock into walking stance. Right high outer forearm block, followed by a right high side backfist strike.

moves.title: High flat fingertip thrust
moves.korean: niunja so opun sonkut nopunde tulgi
moves.description: Pivot 180° left on the right foot to face 12 o'clock into l-stance. High flat fingertip thrust.

moves.title: Front low snap kick
moves.korean: najunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Left palm on back of right hand. Front low snap kick.

moves.title: Right elbow thrust
moves.korean: gunnun so palkup dwit tulgi
moves.description: Retract leg. Pivot 180° left on the left foot to face 6 o'clock. Pull hands to right hip for elbow thrust. Slide right leg to 12 o'clock.

moves.title: Back hand downward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sondung naeryo taerigi
moves.description: Raise and stamp left foot into right l-stance facing 6 o'clock. Left back-hand downward strike.

moves.title: Punch palm
moves.korean: niunja so jirugi
moves.description: Punch into the left palm.

moves.title: Back hand downward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sondung naeryo taerigi
moves.description: Raise and stamp right foot into left l-stance facing 6 o'clock. Right back-hand downward strike.

moves.title: Palm punch
moves.korean: niunja so jirugi
moves.description: Punch into the right palm.

moves.title: Knife-hand outward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi
moves.description: Pivot 180° left on the right foot to face 12 o'clock. Stamp left foot into right l-stance. Knife-hand outward strike.

moves.title: Left backfist high side front strike
moves.korean: gunnun so dung joomuk nopunde yopcha taerigi
moves.description: Slip left foot to walking stance. Left high backfist side-front strike.

moves.title: Middle knife-hand outward strike
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi
moves.description: Raise and stamp right foot into left l-stance facing 12 o'clock. Right middle knife-hand outward strike.

moves.title: Left backfist high side front strike
moves.korean: niunja so dung joomuk nopunde yopcha taerigi
moves.description: Slip right foot to walking stance. Left high backfist side-front strike with right palm on elbow.

moves.title: Low reverse knife-hand block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal dung najunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Pivot 180° left on the right foot to face 6 o'clock into left l-stance. Low reverse knife-hand block.

moves.title: Right 9-shape block
moves.korean: gunnun so gutja makgi
moves.description: Slip left foot into walking stance. Right 9-shape block (right arm low).

moves.title: Low reverse knife-hand block
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal dung najunde daebi makgi
moves.description: Step forward with right foot to 6 o'clock into right l-stance. Low reverse knife-hand block.

moves.title: Left 9-shape block
moves.korean: gunnun so gutja makgi
moves.description: Slip right foot into walking stance. Left 9-shape block (left arm low).

moves.title: Twin horizontal knife-hand strike
moves.korean: gunnun so sang sonkal soopyong taerigi
moves.description: Step behind with right foot to 12 o'clock into walking stance. Twin horizontal knife-hand strike.

moves.title: Right high arc-hand strike
moves.korean: gunnun so bandal son nopunde taerigi
moves.description: Right high arc-hand strike.

moves.title: Right low front snap kick
moves.korean: kaunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Keep hand extended. Right low front snap kick to 6 o'clock.

moves.title: Left high arc-hand strike
moves.korean: gunnun so bandal son nopunde taerigi
moves.description: Lower foot into right walking stance. Left high arc-hand strike.

moves.title: Right low front snap kick
moves.korean: kaunde apcha busigi
moves.description: Keep hand extended. Left low front snap kick to 6 o'clock.

moves.title: Right middle punch
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Lower foot into left walking stance. Right middle punch.

moves.title: Left middle punch
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi
moves.description: Left middle punch. Fast motion.

moves.title: High twin fore-knuckle fist punch
moves.korean: moa so sang inji joomuk nopunde bandal jirugi
moves.description: Bring right foot to left, facing 6 o'clock. High twin fore-knuckle crescent punch.

moves.title: Low left knife-hand block
moves.korean: gunnun so sonkal najunde makgi
moves.description: Pivot 270° left on the right foot to face 9 o'clock. Left foot to walking stance. Low left knife-hand block.

moves.title: High open fist punch
moves.korean: gunnun so pyon joomuk nopunde jirugi
moves.description: Right high open-fist punch to 9 o'clock.

moves.title: Low right knife-hand block
moves.korean: gunnun so sonkal najunde makgi
moves.description: Turn 180° right on the left foot to face 3 o'clock. Low right knife-hand block.

moves.title: High open fist punch
moves.korean: gunnun so pyon joomuk nopunde jirugi
moves.description: Left high open-fist punch to 3 o'clock.

moves.title: Closed ready stance A
moves.korean: moa junbi sogi A
moves.description: Pivot 90° left on the right foot to face 12 o'clock. Bring left foot in to closed ready stance A.
